T02TD2775E:147a-0: @147a * // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzi brjed rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2775E:147a-1: 'jig rten mgon po mnyes bya dang //
T02TD2775E:147a-2: mnyes 'dod dad pa thob pas kyang //
T02TD2775E:147a-3: mang po'i spyod yul 'gyur bar ni //
T02TD2775E:147a-4: mchod rten la sogs brtsam par bya //
T02TD2775E:147a-5: gzi brjid rgyal po zhal gcig pa'am //
T02TD2775E:147a-6: yang na dpag tu med zhal phyag / bsam gyis mi khyab spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD2775E:147a-7: bsod nams bsgrub phyir spyan drangs mchod //
T02TD2775E:147a-8: bdag nyid hr'i: yig las skyes pa'i //
T02TD2775E:147a-9: rtsa ba'i rgyal ba gang bsgoms pa //
T02TD2775E:147a-10: de yis byin brlabs dbang bskur nas //
T02TD2775E:147a-11: rgya mtsho la ni char rgyun bzhin //
T02TD2775E:147a-12: 'jim pa la sogs yo byad la //
T02TD2775E:147a-13: rdo rje 'bar bas bgegs bsal te //
T02TD2775E:147a-14: rig pa'i rgyal pos gzi bskyed la //
T02TD2775E:147a-15: rnal 'byor ldan par byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2775E:147a-16: aom a'a: hr'i: sarba aa bhi ka na na ha ra ha ra pra ha ra h'um h'um phat /
T02TD2775E:147a-17: aom a'a: hr'i: sarba dharma ni rma la bi shuddho sva bh'a wa sarba ma h'a ghun aa nu barti ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2775E:147a-18: aom a'a: h'um ho: de nas rten la tshogs bsags te //
T02TD2775E:147a-19: stong pa nyid dang bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2775E:147a-20: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dgongs mdzad par //
T02TD2775E:147a-21: sngags dang mchod rten bzhengs par bya //
T02TD2775E:147a-22: aom na mo bha ga wa te /
T02TD2775E:147a-28: tatya th'a aom su kshme sa kshme sa me sam ya /
T02TD2775E:147b-0: gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gzungs 'di brgya rtsa brgyad @147b bzlas shing las la 'jug pas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug dran pa dang mi 'bral bar byed na /
T02TD2775E:147b-1: des ji srid yo byad la gnas pa'i rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi mchod rten sku gzugs byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2775E:147b-2: de rjes gzi brjid nyid dpal gyis //
T02TD2775E:147b-3: ye shes spros la rab gnas bya //
T02TD2775E:147b-4: nam mkha' ji srid bzhugs gsol nas //
T02TD2775E:147b-5: bzod par gsol te mchod pas mchod //
T02TD2775E:147b-6: sku gzugs dang mchod rten gyi chog rdzogs so//
